```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(cowplot)
```

```{r}
setwd("G:/My Drive/Circadian Rhythm Genes Project/39.PfamDomain_search/2.Domain_info_pfam_scan")

omega_domain = read.table("domain_omega.csv", header = T, sep = ",")
```

```{r}
pdf("omega_by_domain.pdf", height = 8, width = 10)
ggplot(omega_domain, aes(x =  Domain_Name, y = Omega_value, col = Domain_Name))+
  geom_boxplot()+
  geom_jitter(width = 0.1,size = 2)+
  labs(x = "Domain Names", y = "Median Omega (dN/dS)")+
  theme_cowplot(12)+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 70, vjust = 1, hjust = 1), legend.position = "none")
dev.off()
```
